```{r, handcortab, eval=T, echo=F}
bil_sub %>% 
  group_by(phoneme, language) %>% 
  summarize(mean_f1 = round(mean(f1e)), sd_f1 = round(sd(f1e)),
            mean_f2 = round(mean(f2e)), sd_f2 = round(sd(f2e))) %>% 
    knitr::kable(format = "pandoc", align = rep("r", 11), 
        caption = "Mean and standard deviation of each phoneme in the hand-corrected subset",
        label = "handcortab")
```
